name: Too Broken to be Loved? - A Gaychel Dating Sim
name_original: Too Broken to be Loved? - A Gaychel Dating Sim
description:
Devastated that Bachelorettes Gabby and Rachel didn't end up together?

Well now you don't have to worry about it. Multiple stories, multiple endings, multiple chances for Gabby and Rachel to realize they're in love with each other and ditch all those loser boys.

10.5.2022 - Version 1.0 is live now!
This game is still in development.

This is my first visual novel / dating sim and it is 100% a joke.
I also will use ALL of my energy on a singular joke-- so here we are.

There are many ways to support me:
Subscribe on Patreon, donate on Ko-fi, pop in to my Twitch stream to say hello, etc...
More info at www.minimalgameplay.com

Music featured in the game is by ThemTunes (DMCA free tunes by queer creators!)
https://linktr.ee/themtunesau
